overview: Older woman Magdalene is struggling to overcome her feelings for young, troubled Kasey. Enter sensitive, kind-hearted Madison, whose maturity is a welcome antidote to the chaos of Magdalene's former teenage lover. But when Erica stops by to spill Kasey' secrets, Magdalene is again thrown into a pit of despair where her only hope is to confront the young nymphet and demand the truth.
title: Mother Lovers Society 3
